will-be-removed: will be uninstalled. This operation cannot be undone.
macos-unsupported-platform: is not playable for Mac. But in case, if you are using Apple Silicon Mac for iOS support, or have emulator installed for Windows and Android support, you may play this game. Do you want to install anyway?
macos-system-requirements:
OS: macOS Ventura or Later
CPU: AMD64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support, Apple Silicon
RAM: 16GB or more
GPU: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs, Apple Silicon
windows-system-requirements:
OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
CPU: AMD64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
RAM: 16GB or more
GPU: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
biitmap-server-inaccessible: Bitmap Store couldn't reach to server. Please check your internet connection.
data-not-processable: Bitmap Store couldn't process the data.
decode-failed: Bitmap Store couldn't interpret the data from server.
